sense.name: use again after processing
sense.examples: As paper fibers are recycled the fibers get shorter. I recycled the bottles at the local supermarket. EcoWear recycles old tires and makes shoes from them.

sense.name: repeat a cycle
sense.examples: Please recycle the clothes in the washer, they didn't get clean. When a particle is recycled 27 times the uncertainty of the surface increases.
